General.Name: Queen's Road Capital Investment Ltd.
General.Description: Queen's Road Capital Investment Ltd., a resource focused investment company, invests in privately held and publicly traded resource companies. It acquires and holds securities of long-term capital appreciation with a focus on convertible debt securities and resource projects. The company was formerly known as Lithion Energy Corp. and changed its name to Queen's Road Capital Investment Ltd. in January 2020. Queen's Road Capital Investment Ltd. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Cheung Kong Centre, Central, Hong Kong, V5Z 4C2
